profitable.translation[0].definitions[0]: producing a profit or a useful result
The advertising campaign proved very profitable.
profitable.translation[1].definitions[0]: I thought the meeting was very profitable.
profitable.translation[1].definitions[1]: Innovation has made Sidek one of Mexico’s most profitable companies.
